messages.title: This election is our chance to change the direction of our country.
messages.content: Whether it be fighting for our place in the Single Market, opposing Conservative cuts to our local schools or providing opposition to Theresa May's inevitable majority, I promise to hold her to account, fighting for the best deal for Putney and the country.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Now we have a general election, called so the Conservative party can sweep away all opposition, to implement their vision of an extreme hard Brexit with no one to hold them to account.

issues.education: opposing Conservative cuts to our local schools
issues.governance: This election is our chance to change the direction of our country.

leaflet.personalStatement: After a few hours of restless sleep, I decided to stand as the Liberal Democrat candidate for Putney, Southfields and Roehampton. To fight for a vision of Britain that is open, tolerant and compassionate.

images.caption: Ryan Mercer, Liberal Democrat candidate for Putney, Roehampton and Southfields

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS Remember - This election is our chance to change the direction of our country and say no to a damaging hard Brexit and cuts to our local schools.
